house_listing.house_description: New construction! Beautiful ranch on a large lot! Gas heat/hot water. Fp, self cleaning range, disposal, dw. Buyers can still choose interior colors. Cca nego on fpo. Close to i-64, bases, shopping. Hard to find new const. In vb w/such a large lot. Last home left in subdivision. Hurry!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Contemporary Style, Pantry, Ranch Style
